Package org.nasdanika.graph.processor

Interface DynamicProxyProcessorFactory<P,​H,​E>

    NopEndpointReflectiveDynamicProxyProcessorFactory
    public interface DynamicProxyProcessorFactory<P,​H,​E>
extends ProcessorFactory<P,​H,​E>
    Mix-in interface which creates handler proxies as dynamic proxies.
    Author:
    Pavel

    • Method Detail

      • createHandlerProxy

        default H createHandlerProxy​(Connection connection,
                             Supplier<H> handlerSupplier,
                             HandlerType type)
        Description copied from interface: ProcessorFactory
        Handler proxy passes invocations to the handler returned by the supplier. This method is used to create endpoints before actual handlers are provided by processors.
        Specified by:
        createHandlerProxy in interface ProcessorFactory<P,​H,​E>
        Returns:

      • getHandlerInterface

        Class<?> getHandlerInterface​(Connection connection,
                             HandlerType type)
        Returns:
        Handler interface class to create a dynamic proxy.

      • getClassLoader

        default ClassLoader getClassLoader()
        Returns:
        Classloader to create a proxy. This implementation returns current Thread's context classloader.
